businessProfile.name: Big Horn Merc Pizza
businessProfile.address: 210 Johnson St, Big Horn, WY 82833, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 210 Johnson St, Big Horn, WY 82833, USA

reviews.text: We landed at Big Horn Mercantile Pizza on our way to Yellowstone last fall with our grandkids. We really enjoyed the pizza, the atmosphere and Big Horn in general. Their crust is delicious and so is the sauce. I just took my parents to Yellowstone and stopping at Mercantile Pizza for lunch on our way home was on our agenda. My parents loved it. We live a little over 200 miles away, but we‚Äôre always up for a quick road trip, we‚Äôll definitely be back!

Pizza was good (context it‚Äôs Wyoming) but the staff are apathetic üòê
They think they‚Äôre doing you a favor.
Wait times border on ‚Äúwhy bother?‚Äù

For what it is in the middle of nowhere feel lucky üçÄ they have any edible food or that they allow you to buy it!
My favorite pizza spot!  Chicken pesto on cauliflower crust is my every time go-to. It‚Äôs worth the drive.

Edit August 2025: Have  been in contact with owner, and conversation was conducted. No ill outcomes. We will continue to support this local business.

This is typically our go to as locals. They offer gluten free and dairy free options-something hard to do on pizza. Something has happened recently to the pizza quality/recipe mix. I typically open the box to find a nice doughy, delicious pizza with ample toppings. Our recent orders have been pizzas less than a half inch thick and over done with very little toppings.
The nicest employees who also endeavor to give you a top quality product. Their brick oven baked pizzas are the best. And to top it off, they make cinnamon rolls to die for!

issues: Mobile performance data unavailable - API configuration required
recommendations: Configure Google PageSpeed Insights API for mobile analysis
Test website on mobile devices manually

recentReviews.text: Blonde crust baked to perfection!  Always great food and service!!!!
Best Pizza in the whole country!!!!!
Had the Hawaiian pizza and it was excellent!  Toppings covered the entire pizza and the crust was heavenly!  Can‚Äôt go wrong!
Amazing brick oven pizza! One of our ‚Äúmust go‚Äù places when in the Big Horn Mountains
The pizza was great, but we asked for pineapple on it, and it was not on it.

Edit August 2025: Have  been in contact with owner, and conversation was conducted. No ill outcomes. We will continue to support this local business.

This is typically our go to as locals. They offer gluten free and dairy free options-something hard to do on pizza. Something has happened recently to the pizza quality/recipe mix. I typically open the box to find a nice doughy, delicious pizza with ample toppings. Our recent orders have been pizzas less than a half inch thick and over done with very little toppings.

We landed at Big Horn Mercantile Pizza on our way to Yellowstone last fall with our grandkids. We really enjoyed the pizza, the atmosphere and Big Horn in general. Their crust is delicious and so is the sauce. I just took my parents to Yellowstone and stopping at Mercantile Pizza for lunch on our way home was on our agenda. My parents loved it. We live a little over 200 miles away, but we‚Äôre always up for a quick road trip, we‚Äôll definitely be back!
The food is amazing, But it gets really tiresome when you call and nobody ever answers the phone, So then when you arrive in person, you‚Äôre stuck waiting 30 to 40 minutes for one pizza.

Pizza was good (context it‚Äôs Wyoming) but the staff are apathetic üòê
They think they‚Äôre doing you a favor.
Wait times border on ‚Äúwhy bother?‚Äù

For what it is in the middle of nowhere feel lucky üçÄ they have any edible food or that they allow you to buy it!

detailedReviews.author: LaVonne Metherd
detailedReviews.text: Blonde crust baked to perfection!  Always great food and service!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Linda Billings
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza in the whole country!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Robert Burkart
detailedReviews.text: Had the Hawaiian pizza and it was excellent!  Toppings covered the entire pizza and the crust was heavenly!  Can‚Äôt go wrong!

detailedReviews.author: Angie Skarp
detailedReviews.text: Amazing brick oven pizza! One of our ‚Äúmust go‚Äù places when in the Big Horn Mountains

detailedReviews.author: Merlin Zowada
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was great, but we asked for pineapple on it, and it was not on it.

detailedReviews.author: Allen Wellborn
detailedReviews.text:
Edit August 2025: Have  been in contact with owner, and conversation was conducted. No ill outcomes. We will continue to support this local business.

This is typically our go to as locals. They offer gluten free and dairy free options-something hard to do on pizza. Something has happened recently to the pizza quality/recipe mix. I typically open the box to find a nice doughy, delicious pizza with ample toppings. Our recent orders have been pizzas less than a half inch thick and over done with very little toppings.

detailedReviews.author: Stacy Jones
detailedReviews.text: We landed at Big Horn Mercantile Pizza on our way to Yellowstone last fall with our grandkids. We really enjoyed the pizza, the atmosphere and Big Horn in general. Their crust is delicious and so is the sauce. I just took my parents to Yellowstone and stopping at Mercantile Pizza for lunch on our way home was on our agenda. My parents loved it. We live a little over 200 miles away, but we‚Äôre always up for a quick road trip, we‚Äôll definitely be back!

detailedReviews.author: Izack Brown
detailedReviews.text: The food is amazing, But it gets really tiresome when you call and nobody ever answers the phone, So then when you arrive in person, you‚Äôre stuck waiting 30 to 40 minutes for one pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Cyr & Associates
detailedReviews.text:
Pizza was good (context it‚Äôs Wyoming) but the staff are apathetic üòê
They think they‚Äôre doing you a favor.
Wait times border on ‚Äúwhy bother?‚Äù

For what it is in the middle of nowhere feel lucky üçÄ they have any edible food or that they allow you to buy it!

detailedReviews.author: Yvonne Busse
detailedReviews.text: The nicest employees who also endeavor to give you a top quality product. Their brick oven baked pizzas are the best. And to top it off, they make cinnamon rolls to die for!

detailedReviews.author: Adam Neal
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is really good ....the calzone is amazing and huge. I wanted to save half but couldn't stop eating. Next time we are back in the area will be getting it again....at least once

detailedReviews.author: Michael Fasnacht
detailedReviews.text: Great food! Awesome atmosphere!

detailedReviews.author: Karen Miller
detailedReviews.text: The Supreme pizza was amazing! Full of yummy toppings. Tasty crust. Quiet atmosphere. Looking forward to a return visit next time we are in town.

detailedReviews.author: Zack Petersburg
detailedReviews.text: Highly recommend the jalapeno popper pizza, really great food

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Gramlich
detailedReviews.text: Bloody brilliant.  Clean bathroom.  If you like pizza, this place is worth the trip.

detailedReviews.author: Jason Nunez
detailedReviews.text: My favorite pizza spot!  Chicken pesto on cauliflower crust is my every time go-to. It‚Äôs worth the drive.

detailedReviews.author: Dallas M
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, many of the different varieties. The service is fantastic. It gets a bit crowded, and take out orders can get a little bit delayed so make your order early.

detailedReviews.author: Dennis McKinney
detailedReviews.text: When we are near, we always stop. Yummy

detailedReviews.author: Roseanne G
detailedReviews.text:
My friend and I had gone to the cemetery to help put flags on the veterans graves and decided to stop for lunch at the Big Horn Pizza restaurant.
The pizza was delicious and the service excellent!

detailedReviews.author: Joana S.
detailedReviews.text: Really liked the pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Pleso
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Wyoming (probably).

detailedReviews.author: matias raul rivera toledo
detailedReviews.text: Maravilloso lugar!!!!! Excelente servicio familiar !!!!!! Y la comida Riqu√≠sima!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: michael carnley
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is awesome, probably the best in this area

detailedReviews.author: Hunter Quarterman
detailedReviews.text: One of kind of dough that makes every bite scrumptious.

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Lueth
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza around!

detailedReviews.author: Dora Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Pizza and bit salty üßÇ

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Pruitt
detailedReviews.text: Food is always great here. Only complaint is that they did not use gloves making our sandwiches. I watched the young girl make half our sandwich, check a customer out, scratched her face and the went back to continue making our sandwich. If we didn‚Äôt have our kids with us trying to get in and out with our food to go we would have said something, however, moving forward we might be taking a bit of a break.

detailedReviews.author: Mike Morris
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Chase Philipp
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in the county and always a fun atmosphere

detailedReviews.author: Kathleen Flynn
detailedReviews.text: All the employees are kind and helpful great group of people (workers)

detailedReviews.author: Tanya Shotashvili
detailedReviews.text: This place is fantastic! We have been here twice now and each time it is absolutely delicious!! The staff and owners are polite, helpful and just good people. The calzone is a must!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Roman Shotashvili
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza we've had in a long time not to mention top notch service! The owner and his family were super kind and caring. We came in hungry and left full in all the right places üòâ Wouldn't look anywhere else!

detailedReviews.author: Ben Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Wyoming. Worth the drive.

detailedReviews.author: Amber F Flores
detailedReviews.text: It was so nice to be greeted by smiling faces just walking through the door. Food is incredibly delicious! Best pizza around by far!

detailedReviews.author: dave crowder
detailedReviews.text: I had a gluten free double pepperoni pizza and  we also had the cauliflower crust supreme pizza.  Both were delicious and we love their atmosphere!

detailedReviews.author: Perry Kinoshita
detailedReviews.text: This place is punching well above its weight. The pizza is above average but the calzone is the star. One of the best calzones I've ever had!

detailedReviews.author: Justice Rogers
detailedReviews.text: I can't tell you how happy I am to have found this little hole-in-the-wall deep in Wyoming. Big Horn might be a jaunt but it is most DEFINITELY worth it! The pizza is wood fired, the dining area is real woodsy, and the ladies working there are awesome! I had the Hawaiian Calzone and let me tell you, I don't think I've had a better one! If you're close enough to make the trip, it's worth even a few hours of your time! Also come prepared, they serve frozen margaritas! üòâ

detailedReviews.author: Judy Stallman
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza and calzones in the county!  You can eat there or call ahead for takeout! Nice for small groups

detailedReviews.author: janell hulford
detailedReviews.text:
Super sweet people and super delicious!
Well worth the drive!

detailedReviews.author: Mark Finck
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza and very friendly staff!

detailedReviews.author: Nick Abdallah
detailedReviews.text: This is hands down the best pizza I've ever had.

detailedReviews.author: Chris Roberts
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza and Calzones within 100 miles! Awesome experience! Hawaiian or Mediterranean are to die for. Very friendly staff to boot!

detailedReviews.author: Evi Zillmer
detailedReviews.text: Such a lovely find! Needed to load up on carbs after hiking the cloud peak wilderness and this is the place! Freshly made pizza baked in the stone oven. We loved the chicken artichoke pizza we ordered. Service was outstanding! Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Layla Huizingh
detailedReviews.text: I love love love love love love love love love love love love love the merc- super close and super good service !! My friend and I come here all the time for ice cream or a calzone!!

detailedReviews.author: Crystal Curry
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza around!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Larson
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and even better service.

detailedReviews.author: Ian Churcher
detailedReviews.text: Great takeout, pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Sheldon Bartel
detailedReviews.text: We love the food and service.

detailedReviews.author: Edmund Butler
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely wonderful pizza! The place has such a nice feel to it!

detailedReviews.author: Jude Pettyjohn
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza I've ever had and employs  are super nice

detailedReviews.author: Melissa Martin
detailedReviews.text: Had a delicious brick oven supreme pizza. Cute atmosphere.

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Pruitt
detailedReviews.text: Hands down one of our FAVORITE restaurants. Their sandwiches are toasted to perfection, so delicious and their wine is reasonably priced. We‚Äôre excited to try their salad bar and pizza tonight. Great service as well! Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Jerry Simpson
detailedReviews.text: Off The tourist track one of the best pizza anywhere

detailedReviews.author: Vernon Cherni
detailedReviews.text: Best in Wyoming

detailedReviews.author: Jacob Granger
detailedReviews.text: Delicious brick oven pizza, cozy environment. I highly recommend that you call in advance to make sure there will be a table available though, they are popular and don't have a ton of seating!

detailedReviews.author: Rebecca Barnhart
detailedReviews.text:
A wonderful dining experience was had by my cousins and myself this evening.
Scrumptious pizza (3 cheese and Pesto Italiano) and a trip to the salad bar.
Exceptional staff headed up by Angela. By far my favorite go to dining destination which was seconded by my cousin Nancy!

detailedReviews.author: P G
detailedReviews.text: Best place to get a pizza or calzone in the area!

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Gonda
detailedReviews.text: Great place! We love the Big Horn Merc!  All of their pizzas are delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Missy barber
detailedReviews.text: Always worth the drive!

detailedReviews.author: Brenda Cross
detailedReviews.text: Really Good Pizza and Fantastic Cinnamon Rolls

detailedReviews.author: Leah Bryan
detailedReviews.text: We love this place! The ingredients are superb, the service is great. We have a medical diet in our family and it is hard to find a place where we all can eat easily. But this fits it perfectly. And they are so careful to make sure it is correct for her diet. It is our special stop!

detailedReviews.author: Michael Shreeve
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Northern Wyoming. Best ingredients and all ways cooked just right. The price is also the best for the quality for sure. Plus they are locally owned and operated.

detailedReviews.author: Marc Cox
detailedReviews.text: Not sure what happened, never had a bad meal here. But the pizza was sub-par this time. üòï

detailedReviews.author: Lori Zow
detailedReviews.text: Service is always friendly! Food is delicious! Best pizza in Sheridan county or further!

detailedReviews.author: Rose Berger
detailedReviews.text: Diligent staff, fresh ingredients, fun atmosphere!

detailedReviews.author: Sheldon and Sara Bartel
detailedReviews.text: Has been some time since we visited. The food and service reminded us to visit more frequently. Awesome pizza at fair value.

detailedReviews.author: Richard Mausolf
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza in Wyoming!

detailedReviews.author: Paul Larson
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic and fresh. BBQ chicken pizza was excellent. Tried the sausage, pepperoni and peppers this time and was fantastic. Everything is fresh and local.

detailedReviews.author: Patsy Jean Flaharty
detailedReviews.text: My daughter loves when I get her and her husband gift cards from these folks. She says its the best pizza around.

detailedReviews.author: Kathy Baker
detailedReviews.text: We absolutely LOVE this place! Besides the wonderful service, the food is incredible! Best pizza I‚Äôve had in a long time, & my fianc√© has calzones everywhere he can get them, & he said it‚Äôs the BEST he‚Äôs had! The taco pizza calzone he got last time was unbelievable, & today‚Äôs Angela‚Äôs Alfredo calzone was amazing! Highly‚Ä¶ HIGHLY‚Ä¶ recommended!

detailedReviews.author: Linsey Carlson
detailedReviews.text: Best cheesy bread, hands down!  Alfredo pizza is amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Chris Kennedy
detailedReviews.text: An effing institution!  2 words.... Get here!

detailedReviews.author: Ethan Reedy
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Sheridan County, in my opinion. You can't beat brick oven cooked pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Brittnay Ames
detailedReviews.text: Soooo good. Best Pizza around. Best pizza in the state!!!

detailedReviews.author: Adam Bettencourt
detailedReviews.text: Took about 30 minutes to get it, but it was well worth the wait! We over estimated our ability to eat an entire calzone each, but they were delicious. The crust is perfectly cooked in the fire oven, delicious, fluffy and moist. Atmosphere was very friendly. Will definitely be coming back.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the heavenly crust and excellent toppings on the pizzas, highlighting the quality of the food. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The brick oven baked pizzas are a standout feature, with many customers declaring them the best they've had. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The atmosphere and friendly service are frequently mentioned as part of the enjoyable dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and difficulty reaching the restaurant by phone - text messaging can bring customers back to your restaurant and build a loyal text club for promotions
Negative reviews and reputation issues regarding staff apathy and hygiene practices - review management can address this concern
Inconsistent pizza quality and recipe changes - social media marketing can improve this area

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
